TownHall SDK
@townhall/react Demo

Form Submission Demo

Interactive examples showing how to use the TownHall React SDK for form submissions with built-in state management.

Contact Form

Basic contact form with name, email, and message fields.

const { submit, isSubmitting, isSuccess, error } = useTownHallForm('form-id')

const handleSubmit = async (e) => {
  e.preventDefault()
  const formData = new FormData(e.currentTarget)
  await submit(Object.fromEntries(formData))
}

Newsletter Signup

Simple email-only form with additional metadata.

// Add extra metadata with form data
await submit({
  ...Object.fromEntries(formData),
  source: 'newsletter',
  subscribedAt: new Date().toISOString()
})
